document.full_text: global brands from twitter to amazon are buying up colombian internet addresses, as the country's .co domain attracts organizations unable to get their choice of .com address or who want a shorter name.
document.title: internet addresses: colombia's hottest export?
lines_and_colors: global brands from twitter to amazon are buying up colombian internet addresses, as the country's .co domain attracts organizations unable to get their choice of .com address or who want a shorter name.
